help.name: getEvents
help.description: Displays a list of the current days upcomming events as documented by the Event Calendar. Typically used to check the time of an upcomming training.
help.notes: If no timezone is entered, the calendar will display in Eastern Standard Time by default.

timeZoneNotFound.message: The supplied timezone does not exist.

embedDescription: Be aware that the majority of events are impromptu and are not required to have advanced notice. Make sure to regularly check #broadcast for any unscheduled events.
noEvents: There are no remaining events pre-scheduled for today!
